swetha yalamanchili wrote:

> I have few queries.I am working on a webapplication project that 
> consists of Struts action classes,jsps .I wanted to know where should i 
> apply junit testcase .Is it for Jsps or Struts action class.
> 
> Please let me know if any one can help me?

Hello, Swetha.

If you are just learning to write JUnit tests, then I recommend putting 
your attention in the Action classes. You'll learn a lot there before 
trying to apply those ideas to testing JSPs, which are a little more 
complicated.
